post_detail.description:
Challenge:
Munchkin tasked ClickFire Media to execute a redesign and redevelopment of their website, munchkin.com
Execution:
In true CFM fashion, ClickFire Media designed and developed the Munchkin site from start to finish. CFM developed the site in Drupal. The site included product pages, store locator, information station, customer service, company info and ecommerce store.  All the design elements were created in Photoshop, Illustrator and After Effects. In addition to the website design and development, CFM also helped market and promote the Munchkin cute baby voting contest on their site. Through the contest, Munchkin received more than 48,000 votes.
post_detail.title: Munchkin
